name: multi-gekko
author: Betim S
description: Generate asset/currency config files for gekko trading bot

scripts.run-all: npm-run-all --parallel --max-parallel 10 USD-ALGO.gda BTC-ATOM.gda USDC-BAT.gda BTC-BCH.gda USD-BCH.gda USD-BTC.bin USD-BTC.gda USDC-BTC.gda USDC-CVC.gda USDC-DAI.gda BTC-DASH.gda USD-DASH.gda USDC-DNT.gda BTC-EOS.gda BTC-ETC.gda USD-ETC.gda BTC-ETH.gda USD-ETH.gda USDC-ETH.gda USDC-GNT.gda BTC-KNC.gda USD-KNC.gda USD-LINK.gda USDC-LOOM.gda BTC-LTC.gda USD-LTC.gda USDC-MANA.gda USD-OXT.gda BTC-REP.gda USD-REP.gda BTC-XLM.gda USD-XLM.gda BTC-XRP.gda USD-XRP.gda BTC-XTZ.gda USD-XTZ.gda BTC-ZEC.gda USD-ZEC.gda BTC-ZRX.gda USD-ZRX.gda
